title: InfoWars credibility in the U.S. 2017
summary: This chart shows the Share of respondents made by Response in a 2017 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Not_at_all_credible Response was the InfoWars credibility Response in the 2017 with 43 respondents .
The next Response to make the most respondents was the Not_too_credible Response with 12 respondents closely followed by the Very_credible Response with 6 respondents .
gold: This timeline presents data on the credibility of InfoWars in the United States as of November 2017 . During a survey , six percent of respondents stated that they found the website very credible .
